#labels install
= To install: =

# Edit the configuration file includes/conf.php to suit your needs.
    Choose path to Rediska [ http://rediska.geometria-lab.ru/download/ ]

# Set up mod_rewrite, if necessary
       a .htaccess file with the lines:
{{{
         RewriteEngine On

         RewriteRule (.*) index.php
}}}

        should suffice
